rules.name: Quebec_Montreal
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4) OR ((5 OR 6 ) AND 7)
rules.label: Quebec/Montreal

formulas.name: responses
formulas.expression:
IF({!isCorrectAddress} != null , {!$Label.Is_Correct_Address_Question} + " : " + {!isCorrectAddress} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!isCorrectAddress} = {!No}, {!AddressCommentPlaceholder} + "
", "") + IF({!Contract_Summary_Confirm_Question} != null , {!$Label.Contract_Summary_Confirm_Question} + " : " + {!Contract_Summary_Confirm_Question} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Contract_Summary_Confirm_Question} = {!No}, {!ContractSummaryCommentPlaceholder} + "
", "") + IF({!Telephone_Exacte} != null , {!exactPhoneNumber} + " : " + {!Telephone_Exacte} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Communication_Preference_Picklist} != null , {!$Label.Communication_Preference_Question} + " : " + {!Communication_Preference_Picklist} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Model_Question} != null , {!$Label.Model_Question} + " : " + {!Model_Question} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Model_Access_Answer} != null , {!$Label.Access_Fits} + " : " + {!Model_Access_Answer} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!AC_Access_Placeholder} != null , {!$Label.AC_Access_Placeholder} + " : " + {!AC_Access_Placeholder} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Livraison_HL_Endroit} != null , {!$Label.Livraison_HL_Endroit} + " : " + {!Livraison_HL_Endroit} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Livraison_HL_Gazon} != null , {!$Label.Livraison_HL_Gazon} + " : " + {!Livraison_HL_Gazon} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Livraison_HL_Remplacement} != null , {!$Label.Livraison_HL_Remplacement} + " : " + {!Livraison_HL_Remplacement} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Livraison_HL_GrandeurPiscine} != null , {!$Label.Livraison_HL_GrandeurPiscine} + " : " + {!Livraison_HL_GrandeurPiscine} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Livraison_HL_Piscine_demontee} != null , {!$Label.Livraison_HL_Piscine_demontee} + " : " + {!Livraison_HL_Piscine_demontee} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Livraison_HL_Meme_Endroit} != null , {!$Label.Livraison_HL_Meme_Endroit} + " : " + {!Livraison_HL_Meme_Endroit} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Livraison_HL_Terrain_Droit} != null , {!$Label.Livraison_HL_Terrain_Droit} + " : " + {!Livraison_HL_Terrain_Droit} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Livraison_HL_Denevele} != null , {!$Label.Livraison_HL_Denevele} + " : " + {!Livraison_HL_Denevele} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Livraison_HL_Obstacle} != null , {!$Label.Livraison_HL_Obstacle} + " : " + {!Livraison_HL_Obstacle} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Access_Fits} != null , {!$Label.Access_Fits} + " : " + {!Access_Fits} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Access_Fits_MB} != null , {!$Label.Access_Fits} + " : " + {!Access_Fits_MB} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!Appointment_Cancelling_Reason} != null , {!$Label.Appointment_Cancelling_Reason} + " : " + {!Appointment_Cancelling_Reason} + "
" , "" ) + IF({!To_Be_Contacted} , {!$Label.Delivery_Confirmation_To_be_contacted},"") + IF({!Delivery_Confirmation_Change_Phone} != null , {!$Label.new_phone_number} + " : " + {!Delivery_Confirmation_Change_Phone} + "
" , "" )

formulas.name: ruleConditionsMtl
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!formRule.Montreal_Expiration_Days__c}), TRUE, IF( ISBLANK({!formRule.Expiration_Time_Montreal__c}), TODAY() <= (DATEVALUE({!Service_Appointment.SchedStartTime}) - {!formRule.Montreal_Expiration_Days__c}), IF( TODAY() = (DATEVALUE({!Service_Appointment.SchedStartTime}) - {!formRule.Montreal_Expiration_Days__c}), {!timeNow} <= {!formRule.Expiration_Time_Montreal__c}, TODAY() < (DATEVALUE({!Service_Appointment.SchedStartTime}) - {!formRule.Montreal_Expiration_Days__c}) ) ) )

formulas.name: ruleConditionsQc
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!formRule.Quebec_Expiration_Days__c}), TRUE, IF( ISBLANK({!formRule.Expiration_Time_Quebec__c}), TODAY() <= (DATEVALUE({!Service_Appointment.SchedStartTime}) - {!formRule.Quebec_Expiration_Days__c}), IF( TODAY() = (DATEVALUE({!Service_Appointment.SchedStartTime}) - {!formRule.Quebec_Expiration_Days__c}), {!timeNow} <= {!formRule.Expiration_Time_Quebec__c}, TODAY() < (DATEVALUE({!Service_Appointment.SchedStartTime}) - {!formRule.Quebec_Expiration_Days__c}) ) ) )

{!$Label.important_Information_DeliveryDate} {!deliveryDate}

fields.name: errorMsg
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.fieldText:
{!$Label.Invalid_Link_Title}
